text: Umbite (K2(Zr,Ti)Si3O9·H2O) is a potassium zirconosilicate mineral found in northern Russia. Named after Lake Umb (Lake Umbozero), its type locality is Vuonnemiok River Valley, Khibiny Massif, Kola Peninsula, Murmanskaja Oblast', Northern Region, Russia.Webmineral.com - UmbiteHandbook of Mineralogy (HOM - MSA) - Umbite == References == Category:Inosilicates Category:Orthorhombic minerals
title: Umbite
